H0.text: Which country does the drink Cinzano come from. France

H1.text: Which country does the drink Cinzano come from. Spain

H2.text: Which country does the drink Cinzano come from. Portugal

H3.text: Which country does the drink Cinzano come from. ItalY

A4.text: Cinzano is an Italian brand of vermouth, a brand owned since 1999 by Gruppo Campari.

A5.text: Cinzano vermouths date back to 1757 and the Turin herbal shop of two brothers, Giovanni Giacomo and Carlo Stefano Cinzano
